channel.title: Members on CityU Wang Lab

item.title: Members of our lab
item.description: Feng Gao (PhD Student, 2015.09-2018.08) Feng mainly focused on applying artificial intelligence techniques such as deep learning to cancer research,including but not limited to patient stratification, biomarker and target discovery.Linkedin: https://hk.linkedin.com/in/feng-gao-3b7bb33a Feng was jointly supervised with Prof. Andrew Yen at Cornell University Now: Associate Professor at Sun Yat-sen University, Guangzhou, China Xin Duan (Research Assistant, 2015.09-2017.12) Xin DUAN worked on drug screening by analyzing brain activity maps of zebrafish models.
